FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Question: Why doesn't my invoice match what I see in Campaign Manager?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Answer: Your invoice is the definitive source for your campaign charges. It includes any adjustments, promotions, taxes and other fees...

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Question: How is my invoice amount calculated?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Answer: Invoices are issued based on clicks generated during your billing cycle. Your billing cycle is determined by the payment method you have selected...

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Question: Campaigns are paused but I am still being charged?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Answer: If you have paused your campaigns, please note that spend can accrue for up to 72 hours for clicks generated while the campaign was still active...

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Question: Where can I find more details regarding my billing and payment status?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Answer: Please visit the Billing and Payments section within your Amazon Advertising account to learn more about your invoice and payment history...

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Question: How is my invoice period determined?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.Answer: Your invoice period is based on the time of the occurrence of the clicks and/or impressions, as well as your chosen payment method...
